content.body: In the post-2547 spec, is implicit unwrapping (conversion from normal completion to non-completion value) not supposed to happen?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: In the post-2547 spec, is implicit unwrapping (conversion from normal completion to non-completion value) not supposed to happen?

content.body: that was the title of the pr, even
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: that was the title of the pr, even

content.body: If you invoke an op that returns a Completion Record, and you don't mark it with `!`, `?`, or `Completion()`, is that an editorial error? Seems like that was one of the points of 2547, but I don't see it in the spec.
content.formatted_body: If you invoke an op that returns a Completion Record, and you don't mark it with !, ?, or Completion(), is that an editorial error? Seems like that was one of the points of 2547, but I don't see it in the spec.

If you invoke an op that returns a Completion Record, and you don't mark it with !, ?, or Completion(), is that an editorial error? Seems like that was one of the points of 2547, but I don't see it in the spec.
